name: MEC Merino Long Sleeve Crew - Youths
description:
This merino crew is streamlined and soft to the touch. It's designed to sit next to skin, working with outer layers to seal warmth in and wick sweat away. Few seams and flat stitching reduce chafing during activity.Made of circular knit merino wool jersey and nylon blend that naturally controls odour.Nylon yarns increase durability.Flatlock seams throughout.Interior name label so it won't get lost.Coordinates with MEC Merino Long Johns.

        Sustainability
